If you haven't already,

to become a W3Schooler, and get points for every exercise you complete.
As a logged on  user you will have access to many features like having

The Exercise
We have gathered a variety of React exercises from most of the chapters in our
JavaScript Tutorial
.
The exercises are a mix of "multiple choice" and "fill in the blanks" questions. 
The answer can be found in the corresponding tutorial chapter. If you're stuck, 
or answer wrong, you can try again or hit the "Show Answer" button to see the correct answer.

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this javascript feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers JavaScriptExercises concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use JavaScriptExercises effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of JavaScriptExercises and how to apply it in your projects.
